definitions.meaning: to join; to connect; to link up

sentences.pinyin: wǒ men xū yào gōu tōng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 有效的沟通可以减少误会和冲突。
sentences.traditionalText: 有效的溝通可以減少誤會和衝突。
sentences.pinyin: yǒu xiào de gōu tōng kě yǐ jiǎn shǎo wù huì hé chōng tū.
sentences.translation: Effective communication can reduce misunderstandings and conflicts.
